Customers

This component demonstrates Customer CRUD Module

{{ cust.customerId }} {{ cust.firstName }} {{ cust.lastName }} {{ cust.email }} {{ cust.phone }} {{ cust.country_code }} {{ cust.gender }} {{ cust.balance }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-customer', templateUrl: './customer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./customer.component.css'] }) export class CustomerComponent { public customers: Customer[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'Customer').subscribe(result => { this.customers = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Customer { customerId: string; firstName: string; lastName: string; email: string; phone:string; countrycode:string; gender:string; balance:number; }
